description: Golden Dawn's Christos Pappas defies arrest but 37 colleagues hand themselves in.
title: Golden Dawn's Pappas on the run as colleagues start jail terms
title_page: Golden Dawn's Pappas on the run as colleagues start jail terms - BBC News
maintext: However, a court ruled on Thursday that most of the jail sentences should start straight away. Michaloliakos was among 37 people who turned themselves in. Giorgos Roupakias, who was convicted of the 2013 murder of the musician and given a life sentence, was under house arrest and was also handed over.
